name: GO DICE!!
description:
GO DICE(上骰）!! 是一款赌桌上的冒险游戏，玩家需要控制黑骰小子“Dicy”，根据点数战胜赌桌上的对手（白骰子），在这个过程中，玩家会发现赌局似乎是无止境的，且胜负早已经被设定好，我们希望玩家在这个过程中，不仅能体验到这个休闲小游戏的乐趣，还能感受到“赌徒”在赌桌上的心路历程。

游戏由W，A，S，D，所控制。

Go dice!! It is an adventure game on the gambling table. Players need to control the black dice boy "dicy" and defeat their opponents (white dice) on the gambling table according to their points. In this process, players will find that the gambling game seems to be endless, and the victory and defeat have been set long ago. We hope that players could not only experience the fun of this casual game, but also feel the mental journey of "gamblers" on the gambling table.

The game could be controlled by W A S D on the keyboard.
